data.author: Jirka R.

changelog.release_notes: * Fixed a nasty bug (thanks to dersie  for reporting)

* Aplite (OG) support
* Week number
* Configuration page moved to GitHub
* New indicator for BT disconnect when week number is shown
* Batery can show icon and/or numbers (independent)
* PM indicator can have it's own color
* Improved battery saving
* Fixed a stupid 12/24 time format bug. Reported by LH. Thanks.
* Fixed configuration page -- missing Finnish language in the list

data.description:
Simple watchface with BIG digits, date, and day of week.

Features:
- fully configurable colors
- battery indicator icon and/or numeric value
- bluetooth connection indicator
- vibrate on BT disconnection
- vibrate hourly
- show/hide leading zero
- show hide time separator
- configurable date format
- time format (auto/12H/24H)
- week number (ISO)
- multilanguage
- low battery usage

Supports following languages out of the box:
* English
* Bulgarian / български
* Czech / Čeština
* German / Deutsch
* Danish / Dansk
* Spanish / Español
* Catalan / Català
* Estonian / Eesti
* Finnish / Suomi
* French / Français
* Greek / Ελληνικά
* Croatian / Hrvatski
* Hungarian / Magyar
* Italian / Italiano
* Lithuanian / Lietuvių
* Latvian / Latviešu
* Dutch / Nederlands
* Norwegian / Norsk Bokmål
* Norwegian / Norsk Nynorsk
* Polish / Polski
* Portuguese / Português
* Romanian / Română
* Russian / Русский
* Slovene / Slovenščina
* Slovak / Slovenčina
* Serbian / Српски
* Swedish / Svenska
* Turkish / Türkçe
* Vietnamese / Tiếng Việt

Please give it heart, if you like it. Thank you.
data.title: Simply Big
